content.summary: Sanidhya Singh is a Junior Data Scientist at MoreYeahs Technologies, with a B.Tech in Information Technology from Medi-Caps University. They have demonstrated strong analytical skills and proficiency in various tools such as Python, FastAPI, MTCNN, PyTorch, Inception ResNet, Dataiku, and Apache Beam.

experience.title: Junior Data Scientist
responsibilities: Contributed to the development of a Bank Statement Analyser, employing OCR and Pandas for data manipulation.
Led individual and collaborative projects involving Jetson Nano-based human detection, face recognition, and GCP monitoring automation.
Applied machine learning models to predict outages and enhanced system reliability in client projects.

experience.title: Intern
responsibilities: Engaged in hands-on experience with data science techniques and tools.
Contributed to the development of projects involving log analysis, predictive maintenance, and resume building.

projects.title: Bank Statement Analyser
projects.objective: Develop a bank statement analyzer using OCR to extract tables from bank Pdf’s.
contributions: Led as a Junior Resource in the development of the project.
Utilized Pandas Data Frames for data manipulation and calculation of features as per client requirements.

projects.title: Security System
projects.objective: Develop a comprehensive security system using Jetson Nano.
contributions: Collaborated with the team to develop the project.
Integrated cameras with Jetson Nano for real-time human detection and tracking.

projects.title: Face Recognition System
projects.objective: Design and implement a Face Recognition System using FastAPI for image capture.
contributions: Individually designed and implemented the system.

projects.title: Resume Builder with AI Integration
projects.objective: Develop a Resume Builder project utilizing NLP techniques and advanced algorithms.
contributions: Led the development of the project.

projects.title: AI Avatar and Chatbot Development
projects.objective: Contribute to a client project focused on building an AI avatar and chatbot for website engagement.
contributions: Utilized third-party tools such as D-ID and Google Bard to enhance the capabilities of the avatar and chatbot.

certifications.name: Python for Data Science, AI & Development
Analyzing and Visualizing Data in Looker
Exploring Data Transformation with Google Cloud

candidate_attributes_inferred.initiative_and_self_learning: Developed several projects and contributed to others during their tenure at MoreYeahs Technologies.
candidate_attributes_inferred.teamwork_or_leadership_traits: Collaborated on multiple projects with team members, demonstrated leadership in developing the Resume Builder project.
candidate_attributes_inferred.communication_clarity: Effectively communicated findings and solutions to clients, contributing to improved system performance.
candidate_attributes_inferred.standout_traits: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, demonstrated through various projects such as GCP Monitoring Automation and Data Engineering and Log Analysis using AIMLOPS.
